title: Flight 93 National Memorial: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       These policies apply to all pets big and small. Service animals are permitted in all areas of the memorial  Memorial Plaza at the crash site Pets are permitted on a leash in the parking area and around the parking area, however pets are not permitted in the area of the interpretive panels or the Memorial Plaza. View a map of the Memorial Plaza.  Visitor Center Complex On September 10, 2015 the Visitor Center Complex and trails opened. Visitors can enjoy the trails and the area in and around the parking lot with their pet on a leash, but pets will not be permitted in the area immediately around the Visitor Center including the Flight Path Overlook and inside the Visitor Center and the Learning Center.
